titles.title: Kaytlynn Noggle Federal Life Insurance Equity Act
To amend title 5, United States Code, to make stillborn children eligible for optional life insurance coverage.
Kaytlynn Noggle Federal Life Insurance Equity Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Kaytlynn Noggle Federal Life Insurance Equity Act - Includes a stillborn child within the definition of a "family member" of an eligible individual for purposes of federal employee life insurance provisions.
